scripts.dev: "concurrently "cd OneTeam360.Account && npm run dev" "cd OneTeam360.Authentication && npm run dev"  "cd OneTeam360.Employee && npm run dev" "cd OneTeam360.Master && npm run dev" "cd OneTeam360.Task && npm run dev"
scripts.local: "concurrently "cd OneTeam360.Account && npm run local" "cd OneTeam360.Authentication && npm run local" "cd OneTeam360.Employee && npm run local" "cd OneTeam360.Master && npm run local" "cd OneTeam360.Task && npm run local"
